sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The OpenLDAP package contains slapd, slurpd, LDAP libraries and various utilities, tools, and sample clients.

sect3.title: slapd
sect3.para: slapd is the stand-alone LDAP server.

sect3.title: slurpd
sect3.para: slurpd is the stand-alone LDAP replication server.

sect3.title: LDAP libraries
sect3.para: LDAP libraries support the LDAP programs and provide functionality for other programs interacting with LDAP.

sect3.title: Utilites, Tools, and Sample Clients
sect3.para: The package also provides numerous support programs.
